reviews.customers_say: Customers find the tunic soft, comfortable, and appreciate its quality, with one noting it feels like cashmere. They love the color and find it great for Fall, with one mentioning it's a perfect layering piece. The fit receives mixed feedback - while some find it nice, others say it's too oversized.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exlura sweater vest
items.body: This is a very well made sweater vest, very soft and comfortable, the banding at the bottom adds some weight, it fit perfectly, is very stylish, and is versatile enough to be dressed up or down. I love the shorter front and longer back. A steamer easily removed packaging wrinkles. I paired it with a button down collared blouse and dress pants for work for a classy look. I’d love to have several more in other colors! For reference, I’m 5’ 1”, 155lbs, 38D and purchased the large and it literally fit perfect. I do prefer oversized clothing and a longer front, but this sweater looked so sharp and had the perfect length in the back that I kept it. Read more
items.author: Delaney

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy Many
items.body: Loved this vest. Oversized boyfriend style. Color was nice and matched description. I love it so much I bought one more in another color. Great layering piece for Fall. I ordered XL and it was plenty big for size 14-16. These run large. Read more
items.author: decorbuddy

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cool not great
items.body: Good quality beautiful color but the fit was not so appealing Read more
items.author: D. Bell

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic vest
items.body: This is beautiful!! So soft and versatile!! Great quality, I will purchase another color. I love it get staple in my wardrobe Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE IT
items.body: Just received my sweater vest and I am so very pleased with it. The quality is great and fits perfectly. Love the length of it, it would pair nicely with jeans or leggings. So, so cute!!! I ordered the 2X, and it fits me loose like the model is wearing, and that was the look I was going for as well. I am 5'8", and 220. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too oversized
items.body: Too oversized in an unflattering way. But very soft material Read more
items.author: Christina

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars massive arm holes
items.body: great fabric, great feel and comfort. arm holes are fairly big. I usually wear a med - large in shirts so sized down since its oversized and probably could have gone to a small. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value
items.body: Love this oversize vest. I will purchase in more in different colors when it goes on sale again. I wear XL but I will purchase L next time since it is oversized fit. Read more
items.author: Terra L

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Brown, Brown, Red Brown, Blue, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Houndstooth, Wine Red, White, Dark Blue, Grey Purple, Green, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
